name: The Office Operators
tag_list: office-space, kantoorruimte, kantoorruimte-huren, virtual-office, workspace-solutions, office-solutions, office-space-solutions, office-amsterdam
overview:
The Office Operators are Dutch workplace solutions providers, offering various office space products and services throughout the Netherlands.

The Office Operators consists of four creative individuals with a passion for offering the best office solutions. Combined, The Office Operators have over fifty years of experience in the (flexible) office space market. Starting in 2009 they have build an extensive network of Business Centers throughout the Netherlands.

Locations The Office Operators employ prestigious business centers throughout the Netherlands. Amsterdam, Rotterdam Airport and Schiphol Airport WTC are just a few of the locations The Office Operators have on offer.

Virtual Office A Virtual Office is the perfect solution for start-ups, home and mobile workers and companies entering new markets. With Virtual Office, clients are provided with a prestigious office address and dedicated phone answering service, without actually renting physical square meters.

Flexible Office Space The flexible office space provides the best facilities in combination with supporting services like telephone adoption and secretarial services, but also non-core services such as accounting, legal advice and web design. Flexible Office Spaces come fully furnished and equipped with the latest technology.

Places Individuals are best suited by selecting a ‘Places’ solution. Places is a fully operational workstation equipped with high-speed internet and catering services (Coffee and Tea). Places are available via a subscription plan or pay per day construction.
